author: Simon Difford
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, "Pineapple, turmeric and Patrón Reposado give this margarita the golden touch bartender Natalie Jacob envisioned for her Margarita of the Year contender. The Golden Hour Margarita captures the magic of a New York City sunset reflecting off the buildings with a citrusy and spicy twist."
name: Golden Hour Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: This drink can be shaken and served on the rocks or frozen
Rim a glass with a mixture of equal parts salt, turmeric and chilli pepper
SHAKE all ingredients or blend to combine
Pour into rimmed glass (filled with ice if you used a shaker)
Special ingredient #1: Tumeric agave syrup - 2 cups agave, 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons turmeric powder
Add agave, water and turmeric to a saucepan
Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring frequently to incorporate the turmeric
Let cool and strain into a sealable bottle
